CustomField.description: Actual Approver for the Business Rule
CustomField.formula: IF(NoT(ISBLANK(Account_Team_Member__c)),HYPERLINK("/" & Account_Team_Member__r.Id, Account_Team_Member__r.FirstName + ' ' + Account_Team_Member__r.LastName ) , IF(NoT(ISBLANK(Approver_Contact__c )), HYPERLINK("/" & Approver_Contact__r.Id, Approver_Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + Approver_Contact__r.LastName),IF(NoT( ISBLANK(Title__c )), HYPERLINK("/" & Title__r.Id, Title__r.Name ),IF(NoT( ISBLANK(Department__r.Name) ), HYPERLINK("/" & Department__r.Id, Department__r.Name ),IF(NoT( ISBLANK( User__c ) ), HYPERLINK("/" & User__r.Id, User__r.FirstName + ' '+ User__r.LastName ), IF(NoT( ISBLANK( Email__c ) ), Email__c ,null))))))
CustomField.label: Approver
